Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Presentation of the Lord Christ in the Temple:

Text.Language: You were carried in the arms of Your servant Simeon / In your grasp, are death and life / Simeon called “Let me depart according to Your Word / In peace”, he was released from the bonds of life.
حُملتَ على ذراعى سمعان عبدك: والحياة والموت فى قبضة يدك: ناداك سمعان (أطلقنى كوعدك: بسلام ) فأنحل من رباط الحياة.
All/louia (4) I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V] afse e~qoun e~piervei.
Alleluia (4) Jesus Christ, the Son of God, entered into the temple.
الليلويا (4) يسوع المسيح ابن الله دخل الى الهيكل.
